items.name: Khujand Discovery Dome
items.short_description: An interactive science center featuring a planetarium and hands-on exhibits exploring physics, chemistry, and astronomy. Perfect for curious young minds.

items.name: Little Innovators Lab
items.short_description: A creative space where children can engage in STEM activities, robotics workshops, and experimental learning through play. Fosters problem-solving skills.

items.name: Future Engineers' Workshop
items.short_description: Dedicated to engineering principles, this center offers building challenges, simple machine demonstrations, and a space for kids to design and test their own creations.

items.name: Khujand Eco-Science Hub
items.short_description: Focuses on environmental science, offering exhibits on local ecosystems, renewable energy, and sustainability practices through engaging, hands-on activities.

items.name: Jurassic Khujand Land
items.short_description: Step back in time to an era dominated by colossal dinosaurs. Features life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digs, and educational exhibits.

items.name: Dino Roar Adventure
items.short_description: An interactive dinosaur park with walking trails among realistic dino replicas, a 'dinosaur egg' hunt, and a mini-museum about paleontology.

items.name: Triassic Trek Discovery
items.short_description: Explore the earliest period of dinosaurs in this immersive park, featuring smaller, less-known species and geological formations from the Triassic period.

items.name: Khujand Dino Dig Site
items.short_description: A hands-on experience where children can act as paleontologists, digging for replica bones in a large sandpit and assembling dinosaur skeletons.

items.name: Khujand Underwater World
items.short_description: Explore the diverse aquatic life of the world's oceans and freshwater systems. Features a walk-through tunnel and daily feeding shows.

items.name: Syr Darya Aquarium & River Life Center
items.short_description: Dedicated to the aquatic ecosystems of the Syr Darya river and other Central Asian freshwater environments. Learn about local fish and conservation efforts.

items.name: Coral Reef Discovery
items.short_description: A vibrant exhibition focusing on the beauty and fragility of coral reef ecosystems, home to colorful fish and unique invertebrates.

items.name: Touch Pool & Tide Pool Explorers
items.short_description: An interactive area where children can gently touch starfish, sea cucumbers, and other tide pool creatures under the supervision of educators.

items.name: Khujand Star Circus
items.short_description: A traditional circus featuring acrobats, clowns, animal acts (ethical, domesticated animals only), and thrilling performances for all ages.
items.address: Park Culture & Recreation named after Kamoli Khujandi, Khujand

items.name: Magic Strings Puppet Theater
items.short_description: Delightful puppet shows bringing classic fairy tales and local legends to life with beautifully crafted puppets and engaging storytelling.

items.name: Khujand Youth Circus School
items.short_description: Not just a show, but a place where kids can learn circus skills like juggling, acrobatics, and unicycling. Offers weekly performances by students.

items.name: Shadow Play Fantasies
items.short_description: A unique puppet theater specializing in traditional and modern shadow puppetry, creating magical visual stories with light and silhouette.

items.name: Lost City Khujand Escape Room
items.short_description: Teams solve puzzles and unravel mysteries to escape themed rooms within a time limit. Offers various difficulty levels suitable for families.
items.address: Khujand Plaza, Building C, Floor 2, Khujand

items.name: Treasure Hunt of the Ancient Silk Road
items.short_description: An outdoor treasure hunt combining historical facts about the Silk Road with engaging clues and challenges spread across a local park.

items.name: Mythical Creatures VR Quest
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in virtual reality to complete quests and interact with legendary creatures in fantastical landscapes. A thrilling digital adventure.

items.name: Secret Agent Training Academy
items.short_description: Kids tackle spy-themed challenges, obstacle courses, and puzzle-solving missions to become certified secret agents. Develops agility and critical thinking.
items.address: Near Youth Lake Sports Complex, Khujand

items.name: Khujand Toon Town Festival
items.short_description: A rotating event featuring popular cartoon characters from around the world. Kids can meet, take photos, and interact with their favorite animated heroes.

items.name: Hero's Welcome Character Breakfast
items.short_description: Enjoy a delicious breakfast buffet while beloved cartoon characters visit your table for individual interactions, photos, and autographs.

items.name: Local Legends & Storybook Friends
items.short_description: Meet characters based on traditional Tajik folklore and classic children's storybooks, promoting local culture and literacy.
items.address: National Library of Khujand, Children's Wing

items.name: Princess & Superhero Parade
items.short_description: A lively parade through a designated route where children can wave to and greet their favorite princesses and superheroes. Daily photo opportunities after the parade.

items.name: Khujand Children's Farmstead
items.short_description: A working farm where kids can interact with friendly farm animals, learn about agriculture, and participate in feeding and grooming activities.

items.name: Harvest Haven Mini Farm
items.short_description: Focuses on crop growing and gardening for kids. Features seasonal fruit picking, vegetable patches, and workshops on healthy eating and plant care.
items.address: Near Youth Lake Park, Agricultural Zone, Khujand

items.name: Wool & Wonders Alpaca Farm
items.short_description: A unique farm experience centered around alpacas and other fiber animals. Kids can feed, pet, and learn about wool production, with spinning demonstrations.

items.name: Farmer's Fun Playground
items.short_description: Combines a farm setting with playground elements. Kids can climb on tractor replicas, navigate hay bale mazes, and play in barn-themed structures.

items.name: Khujand Wonder World
items.short_description: A full-scale theme park designed for younger children, featuring gentle rides, character zones, and live entertainment. Safe and exciting for families.
items.address: Grand Park Avenue, Outskirts of Khujand

items.name: Miniature Khujand Land
items.short_description: Explore famous landmarks of Khujand and Tajikistan in miniature form. Also features small-scale train rides and interactive cultural exhibits for kids.

items.name: Fantasy Forest Adventure Park
items.short_description: A nature-themed park with treehouse playgrounds, rope bridges, a small zipline for kids, and an enchanted forest trail with mythical creature statues.
items.address: East of Khujand, near Amu Darya river

items.name: Water Splash Kingdom
items.short_description: A themed water park with splash pads, shallow pools, mini slides, and water play structures, perfect for beating the summer heat.

items.name: Khujand Family Zoo
items.short_description: Home to a variety of animals from around the world, with spacious enclosures, educational talks, and conservation programs.

items.name: Little Paws Petting Farm
items.short_description: A charming petting zoo where children can safely interact with goats, sheep, rabbits, and other friendly farm animals.

items.name: Aviary of Khujand Birds
items.short_description: An immersive aviary featuring local and exotic bird species. Walk through free-flight enclosures and learn about different bird habitats.
items.address: Park Culture & Recreation named after Kamoli Khujandi, Khujand

items.name: Reptile Realm & Amphibian Ark
items.short_description: Discover the fascinating world of reptiles and amphibians from various continents. Educational displays and occasional live handling demonstrations.

items.name: Central Khujand Adventure Park
items.short_description: A large outdoor adventure park with climbing structures, giant slides, ziplines for older kids, and designated areas for toddlers.
items.address: Main entrance of Navruz Park, Khujand

items.name: Toddler's Tiny Town Playground
items.short_description: Specifically designed for very young children, this soft-play area offers safe and engaging activities like mini-slides, ball pits, and sensory play.

items.name: Sky High Ropes Course
items.short_description: An aerial adventure for brave kids and teens, featuring a multi-level ropes course with various obstacles and challenges high above the ground.

items.name: Urban Sport Park & Skate Zone
items.short_description: A dynamic park designed for active kids, featuring skate ramps, bike trails, and open spaces for general sports and free play.
items.address: Corner of Lenin Avenue and Vahdat Street, Khujand
